solution_line_template: Elysse and her brother can carry {bags_per_person_per_trip} x {number_of_people} = <<{bags_per_person_per_trip}*{number_of_people}={total_bags_per_trip}>>{total_bags_per_trip} bags of groceries with each trip from the car.
Therefore, it will take both of them {total_bags}/{total_bags_per_trip} = <<{total_bags}/{total_bags_per_trip}={total_trips}>>{total_trips} trips.
